newsitem.title: USA: IOWA-S MINN FED CATTLE WEAK TO OFF $0.50 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: IOWA-S MINN FED CATTLE WEAK TO OFF $0.50 - USDA.

text.p: Live Sales - compared to Tuesday's close - Slaughter steers and heifers were weak to $0.50 per cwt lower, USDA said. Trade slow to moderate. Demand and seller interest light to moderate. Offerings moderate. Confirmed - 2,700 Week Ago - 7,000 Year Ago - 5,000 Wk to Date - 8,900 Week Ago - 31,100 Year Ago - 42,000
Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1175-1300 lbs 65.50-66.00 couple lds 66.50.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1075-1200 lbs 65.00-66.00.
Carcass Basis (weight only) Compared to Mondays close - Slaughter steers and heifers weak to $1.00 per cwt lower.

Steers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1200-1300 lbs 105.00 few ** 106.00 Holstein - (weight only) Select to mostly Choice 2-3 1250-1400 lbs 99.50-101.00 Holsteins - ( grade and weight) Choice 2-3 1250-1350 lbs ld 100.00 Select 2-3 1250-1350 lbs 96.00.
Heifers - Select to mostly Choice 2-4 1075-1200 lbs 105.00 ld 105.50.
